cleaned_text: How to Properly Dispose of Chemicals — Anthroposophy India World News Properly disposing of chemicals is essential to protect human health and the environment. Here are some steps you can take to dispose of chemicals safely: Identify the chemical: Know what type of chemical you are dealing with and check its label or Safety Data Sheet (SDS) for proper disposal instructions. Contact local authorities: Reach out to your local hazardous waste disposal facility, fire department, or other authorities for guidelines on how to properly dispose of the chemical. Store the chemicals properly: Keep the chemicals in their original containers with tightly closed lids, and store them in a secure, dry, and cool place, away from direct sunlight, heat, and moisture.
